column4: Hi. I wanted to try the LiveDVD of 12.10 Beta 1. But I can't even boot it. After the first splashscreen (black, with the keyboard icon and the "man in the circle" icon, graphics gets messed up. I don't see a boot-options menu or anything, just scrambled graphical artifacts. Already had the same effect with the 10.04 LiveDVD. What to do?
man in circle = hit space and try the nomodeset option yet?
Thanks, didn't know. Will try right now (it's on the other computer). brb
Ok, the "nomodeset" actually worked for me. Thanks so much.
